amendment.description: Amendment increases the loan limit for the Title I single family home improvement program from $25,000 to $32,500.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 106-562 to increase the loan limit for the Title I single family home improvement program from $25,000 to $32,500 to reflect the increase in housing material costs since 1991 when the limit was last increased.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weygand amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
